articles.title: ButterCream Icing
articles.description: Various flavored icing for cakes, etc.
articles.contents:
Contents
Chocolate Icing
Ingredients
Lactose Free
Directions


Chocolate Icing
Ingredients
1 cup icing sugar (also known as confectioners sugar)
3 tbsp cocoa
2 tbsp butter
2 tsp vanilla
1 - 3 tsp water
Lactose Free
For a lactose free option, you can replace the 2 tbsp butter with 2 tbsp of margarine, and you will only need 1 tsp of water.
Directions
Combine dry ingredients and butter into a bowl.
Mix using a hand-mixer on low speed.
Add water 1 tsp at a time, adding it and then mixing.
This is especially important when using margarine, as it has more water than the butter.

articles.title: Never Fail Brownies
articles.contents:
Contents
Ingredients
Directions

Pre-heat oven to 350F
Uses a 9x9 baking dish. Doubled will fill a 9x13 baking dish.
Ingredients
6 tbsp canola or vegetable oil
1 cup white sugar
2 eggs
1/4 tsp salt
1/2 tsp vanilla
1 cup flour
1/2 cup cocoa
Directions
Combine 6 tbsp oil, 1 cup white sugar, 2 eggs, 1/4 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp vanilla in a bowl.
Mix together.
Add 1 cup flour, and mix in.
Mix 1/2 cup cocoa with enough hot water to make a paste or slurry.
Pour cocoa mix into other ingredients.
Mix until cocoa is completely incorporated into the other ingredients.
Pour mixture into a greased baking dish.
Bake at 350F for 20 - 30 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out mostly clean.
If after 20 minutes it is still very gooey in the middle, check again in 5 minutes. Leaving it until 30 might result in dry brownies.

Source: Heather Raymond, family friend of Sarah Flight.
